bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage (1000 V ac and below, 3200 V dc and below) Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear
Amendment 1: Control and Secondary Circuits and Devices, and All Wiring
IEEE Standard for Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage (1000 V ac and below, 3200 V dc and below) Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear - Amendment 1: Control and Secondary Circuits and Devices, and All Wiring
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.20.1a-2020 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.20.1-2015)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The requirements for control, secondary, and logic-level wiring are addressed in this amendment. It covers wire type, ampacity, and methods for protecting wiring across a hinge.
The requirements for control, secondary, and logic-level wiring are addressed in this amendment. It covers wire type, ampacity, and methods for protecting wiring across a hinge.
